name: Overtime Hitman
description:
As a legendary, ice-cold killer without scruples or morals, you plunge into battle. By day an ordinary office worker, by night a knight of the oppressed and avenger of those the system has already devoured. Defend yourself against the waves of machines and survive the onslaught of robots terrorising the city streets.

Keyboard:

Move - A/D

Jump - Space

Dash - Shift

Suitcase Hit - J

Sniper - K

Hammer - L

Controller:

Move - Left  stick

Jump - South Button

Suitcase - East Button

Sniper - West Button

Hammer - North Button

Dash - Shoulder Buttons

This game was made for the htk academy Game Jam 2022 Fire Edition :)

Have fun<3
